erc20 tokens or native coins from the token contract. It is required since the bridge contract is the owner of the token contract.","params":{"_to":"address of the tokens/coins receiver.","_token":"address of the claimed token or address(0) for native coins."}},"decimalShift()":{"details":"Returns the value of foreign-to-home decimal shift.","return":"decimal shift."},"executeAffirmation(address,uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Executes a message affirmation for some Foreign side event. Can be called only by a current bridge validator.","params":{"recipient":"tokens/coins of receiver address, where the assets should be unlocked/minted.","transactionHash":"reference event transaction hash on the Foreign side of the bridge.","value":"amount of assets to unlock/mint."}},"feeManagerContract()":{"details":"Retrieves the address of the fee manager contract used.","return":"address of the fee manager contract."},"fixAssetsAboveLimits(bytes32,bool,uint256)":{"details":"Fixes locked tokens, that were out of execution limits during the call to executeAffirmation.","params":{"hashMsg":"reference for bridge operation that was out of execution limits.","unlockOnForeign":"true if fixed tokens should be unlocked to the other side of the bridge.","valueToUnlock":"unlocked amount of tokens, should be less than txAboveLimitsValue. Should be less than maxPerTx(), if tokens need to be unlocked on the other side."}},"getFeeManagerMode()":{"details":"Retrieves the mode of the used fee manager.","return":"manager mode identifier, or zero bytes otherwise."},"maxAvailablePerTx()":{"details":"Retrieves maximum available bridge amount per one transaction taking into account maxPerTx() and dailyLimit() parameters.","return":"minimum of maxPerTx parameter and remaining daily quota."},"outOfLimitAmount()":{"details":"Total amount coins/tokens that were bridged from the other side and are out of execution limits.","return":"total amount of all bridge operations above limits."},"owner()":{"details":"Tells the address of the owner","return":"the address of the owner"},"setFeeManagerContract(address)":{"details":"Updates the address of the used fee manager contract. Only contract owner can call this method. If during this operation, home fee is changed, it is highly recommended to stop the bridge operations first. Otherwise, pending signature requests can become a reason for imbalance between two bridge sides.","params":{"_feeManager":"address of the new fee manager contract, or zero address to disable fee collection."}},"setForeignFee(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the fee percentage for foreign->home bridge operations. Only owner is allowed to call this method.","params":{"_fee":"new value for fee percentage."}},"setGasPrice(uint256)":{"details":"Public setter for fallback gas price value. Only bridge owner can call this method.","params":{"_gasPrice":"new value for the gas price."}},"setHomeFee(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the fee percentage for home->foreign bridge operations. Only owner is allowed to call this method. If during this operation, home fee is changed, it is highly recommended to stop the bridge operations first. Otherwise, pending signature requests can become a reason for imbalance between two bridge sides.","params":{"_fee":"new value for fee percentage."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows nodes.name: HomeBridgeErcToErc
claimTokensFromErc677
onExecuteAffirmation
onSignaturesCollected
onFailedAffirmation
HomeBridgeErcToErc
claimTokensFromErc677
onExecuteAffirmation
onSignaturesCollected
onFailedAffirmation

claimTokensFromErc677(address,address).details: Withdraws erc20 tokens or native coins from the token contract. It is required since the bridge contract is the owner of the token contract.

params._token: address of the claimed token or address(0) for native coins.

decimalShift().details: Returns the value of foreign-to-home decimal shift.

executeAffirmation(address,uint256,bytes.details: Executes a message affirmation for some Foreign side event. Can be called only by a current bridge validator.

params.recipient: tokens/coins of receiver address, where the assets should be unlocked/minted.
params.transactionHash: reference event transaction hash on the Foreign side of the bridge.

feeManagerContract().details: Retrieves the address of the fee manager contract used.
feeManagerContract().return: address of the fee manager contract.

fixAssetsAboveLimits(bytes32,bool,uint25.details: Fixes locked tokens, that were out of execution limits during the call to executeAffirmation.

params.hashMsg: reference for bridge operation that was out of execution limits.
params.unlockOnForeign: true if fixed tokens should be unlocked to the other side of the bridge.
params.valueToUnlock: unlocked amount of tokens, should be less than txAboveLimitsValue. Should be less than maxPerTx(), if tokens need to be unlocked on the other side.

getFeeManagerMode().details: Retrieves the mode of the used fee manager.
getFeeManagerMode().return: manager mode identifier, or zero bytes otherwise.

maxAvailablePerTx().details: Retrieves maximum available bridge amount per one transaction taking into account maxPerTx() and dailyLimit() parameters.
maxAvailablePerTx().return: minimum of maxPerTx parameter and remaining daily quota.

outOfLimitAmount().details: Total amount coins/tokens that were bridged from the other side and are out of execution limits.
outOfLimitAmount().return: total amount of all bridge operations above limits.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

setFeeManagerContract(address).details: Updates the address of the used fee manager contract. Only contract owner can call this method. If during this operation, home fee is changed, it is highly recommended to stop the bridge operations first. Otherwise, pending signature requests can become a reason for imbalance between two bridge sides.

params._feeManager: address of the new fee manager contract, or zero address to disable fee collection.

setForeignFee(uint256).details: Updates the fee percentage for foreign->home bridge operations. Only owner is allowed to call this method.

setGasPrice(uint256).details: Public setter for fallback gas price value. Only bridge owner can call this method.

params._gasPrice: new value for the gas price.

setHomeFee(uint256).details: Updates the fee percentage for home->foreign bridge operations. Only owner is allowed to call this method. If during this operation, home fee is changed, it is highly recommended to stop the bridge operations first. Otherwise, pending signature requests can become a reason for imbalance between two bridge sides.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: the address to transfer ownership to.
